General improvements and bug fixes.
General improvements and bug fixes.

Voi-la! Fredrik Hjelm, CEO, here.
Some users said they couldn’t end their rides inside the green zones where you get rewarded for parking. That was pretty bad. We fixed it. Another thing; we fixed so your location will be centered every time you open the app. I’m there for you. Always. And if you’ve read this far: I love you. Seriously. I do. K, thx, bye.

From this version update, we will make sure you have the latest supported version of the app to ensure you always have a fresh experience when interacting with us. We will also be monitoring the crash issues closely, to help ourselves eliminate them. Along with that, say hi to our newly styled buttons… Go on, try it… Tell us how you like them. :)

We’ve been out bug hunting! Not with nets or anything, but in the app. Found a few and fixed them. We’ve also created this thing so that we can better monitor crash issues, but that’s more of a treat for us. So do we have anything for you?
Well, say hello to the new button designs! Find, point, click, scan, use, lock and unlock your way through the city.

Hi there,
this week we’ve mostly focused on squashing annoying bugs to continue ensuring a magic experience for you!
Xoxo, Voi.

Hi there,
this week we’ve made it so that new Voi-riders will see an onboarding with zones (no parking zones, slow zones, etc) relevant to the city.
Xoxo, Voi.

Hey Voier, can we have your number? Don’t worry, we won’t spam you during late nights or anything. We’re just introducing SMS login to increase your security and to ensure that you are indeed yourself.
Also we have fixed some annoying bugs for you. So go ahead, try out our Christmas update!

Hey Voier,
We want to wish you a happy new year with this small update that should resolve some bugs for you!
Happy riding!

Hi there!
This update brings new features such as a new & crispy onboarding, a full screen ride experience, better autofocus on the camera while scanning scooters & some minor bug fixes. We hope you like it!
Until next time – have a good one!

Hi there!
We’ve now fixed a bug regarding redeeming codes. We’ve also done some design polishing on the ride card where you unlock and lock your Voi!
Have a great week!

Hi scooter-trooper!
We have a new update with some enhancements to our existing features and some bug-squashing. Hope you have a great experience with us!
Until next time ;)

Hi there!
In this update, we have improved the experience when you lock the scooter and end your ride! And cherry on the cake: we've also fixed some bugs ;)
Enjoy!

Hi there!
We now have a new ride tutorial for our first time riders! Access it by tapping "How to ride" from the menu!
Until next time, have a good one!

Hi scooter trooper!


We’re always making changes and improvements to Voi. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on!
We have a new update with some enhancements to our existing features and some bug-squashing. Hope you have a great experience with us!

Until next time;)

Hi Riders!
We have a new version update which should fix some minor bugs. Keep your updates on, so you get our latest fixes and improvements!
Until next time ;)

Hi Riders!
We have a new version update which should fix some minor bugs. Keep your updates on, so you get our latest fixes and improvements!
Until next time ;)

Hi Rider!
We are always striving to make your experience awesome! So stay up-to-date with your automatic updates on!


Improvements in this version include:


- Updated rating experience of your ride
- Design updates
- Pesky bugs on scan button, and issue report screen fixed


Until next time, have a good one! :)

Hi Rider!
We are always striving to make your experience awesome! So stay up-to-date with your automatic updates on!


Improvements in this version include:


- Improved zone representation on map with designated icons!
- Improved Map user experience
- Bug fixes on Scan screen
- General user experience improvements



Until next time, have a good one! :)

Hi Rider!
We are always striving to make your experience awesome! So stay up-to-date with your automatic updates on!


Improvements in this version include:


- No more problems of unresponsive scooter after ride starts!
- You can write to us about your good rides too! Let us know if you loved riding with us. Because as we work on your improvement suggestions, your compliments motivate us.
- Support for custom keyboards
- Some other user experience improvements
- Bug fixes on map


Until next time, have a good one! :)

Hi Rider!
We are always striving to make your experience awesome! So stay up-to-date with your automatic updates on!


Improvements in this version include:


- Intuitive end-ride experience with precise alerts to guide you.
- Option to sign up for personalized email updates, promotions, unique offers and more!
- All new in-ride controls, for a smoother ride. Take a ride, try them out!
- Improved security measures in the card payment option.
- Font issue resolved for iOS 12 and older devices.
- Other UI and user experience improvements.


Until next time, have a good one! :)
